name: The Futanati
description: Sin descripción

name: The Potion Master
description: Markus, the young apprentice of a local potion master, has barely started his apprenticeship when trouble began - his master, Zabella, was found lifeless (but not quite dead) on the floor of her own underground lab. The local doctor can only do so much, leaving it up to Markus to investigate his master's mysterious collapse and -hopefully- find a way to cure her.

name: Gang of Dummizz
description:
After being wrongly accused by their former boss, Big Mum and her former colleagues decide to form the Gang of Dummizz. Their goal: to rob the bank where they were employed.

The aim is to steal as many valuable items as possible within a given time, while sparing hostages and never ending up in prison.

name: Sudoku 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Conqueror's Blade: Colosseum
description: Rise to glory in the Colosseum by fighting through a brutal Seasonal Campaign inspired by the gladiator combat of Ancient Rome. Conqueror's Blade: Colosseum features three new units, the brand-new Colosseum Mode, rewards for champions, and so much more.

name: ArcheWorld
description: ArcheWorld is the first seamless, open-world PC MMORPG that utilizes NFT(Non-Fungible Token) based on blockchain technology. Battle enemies and explore a wide world across a selection of classes and areas!

name: Maze Game
description: Maze Game challenges players to build the strongest maze they can, to see who can keep the ball on the board for longest.

name: Dream of Light
description: This is a walking simulator developed by Unreal 4. The scene contains a certain amount of fragmented dialogue content. It tells the story of a young girl who left her hometown to venture into the outside world. .......

name: Deadshot
description:
Deadshot.io is a CS:GO style IO game that you can play right now within your browser at https://deadshot.io

As a highly skilled FPS Shooter, you have 4 different maps to master, along with 4 different weapon classes you can use. Taking inspiration from other games, Deadshot allows a quick and efficient movement system that allows you to slide around the map and confuse your enemies. This game is constantly in development, so expect many more exciting features coming soon!

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Light
description: The 8th season of Pokémon Go, "Season of Light", is themed by light and the cosmos. It will introduce the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo and Lunala (and their evolution family, Cosmog and Cosmoem) and feature special Pokémon Go Leagues.

name: TheTravelGame
description: A few minutes per play. Your questions will change the world.... A quiz horror game with multiple endings.

name: The Sims 4: First Fits Kit
description: Dress the next generation of trendsetters in fashion fit for a playdate with The Sims 4 First Fits Kit. Whether a child Sim wants to turn heads on the first day of school or run around having fun with friends, these versatile styles will keep them looking fashionable (and SO cute).

name: Lustful Ponies 2
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 pony girls with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Motherless
description: This is Sunny's story, he was separated from his mother at birth, knowing almost nothing about his past he'll try to find her. Help him find his mother and you'll be rewarded greatly during this process.

name: Cyber Protocol + Clumsy Rush + Brawl Chess
description: Want to feel like a cyberpunk hacker? Save your friend by beating 100 levels of security system in this hardcore arcade puzzle game. If you'd like, you can also challenge others in Brawl Chess, a chess game with a lively cartoon style. In case you want to spend time with more people, Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of laughter for friends and family.

name: Interkosmos 2000
description:
Go to space. Save the Future. Try not to Die.

Welcome (back) to the world of Interkosmos for an even wilder, weirder and more wondrous adventure.

Experience the intense exhilaration of spaceflight. Explore the awe-inspiring interiors of a realistic space capsule.

Master the crucial systems that will keep you in orbit (and breathing). And while you’re at it, try your best not to die.

Should you complete your mission, you just might save the future – and yourself. Should you fail? Let’s not think about that.

With more challenges, more stunning visuals and more hours of replayability than ever, the year 2000 has never been so thrilling.

name: DecayLore
description: We always thought that our annihilation as mankind would be different, something epic and straight out of an action movie… but it wasn’t. there was no zombie apocalypse, no nuclear war… just our own demons taking over us… nobody knows why all of this happened and at this point, nobody really cares either. People only care about survival and holding on to their humanity along the way. But it’s hard to live like an animal and not to feel like one. So, they are holding on to the only thing that made them different in the first place; imagination, creating something and mixing knowledge with art… literature.

name: Space Science Investigations
description:
Welcome to the International Space Station! It’s your job to make sure the resupply H-II Transfer Vehicle (HTV) is successfully berthed to the International Space Station. But before you can do that you must prepare the ISS for the HTV’s arrival.

Moving in zero-g will be different than what you are used to on Earth. Spend some time flying, flipping, and spinning around the station without gravity to assist you. But be careful, you might get sick! While completing tasks and floating around the International Space Station you will learn about and experience the effects of microgravity on the human body.

The app contains information on the effects of microgravity on the human body for use in the classroom and at home.

name: Ramp Bike Jumping
description: Become a crazy bike driver! How far can you jump?

name: Zombies in City: Apocalypse Survival
description: Survival game in which you need to survive a real zombie apocalypse!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Sneaking R
description: "Kunoichi" invades the enemy's castle. Let's capture all 100 stages quickly without being found by the enemy.

name: Draw Rider Remake
description: Draw Rider - a classic racing game, made in 2D.

name: ForeVR Cornhole
description: VR Cornhole is here! Known also as Bags or Bean bags.... Toss a bean bag across the yard into a hole through a wood platform in Virtual Reality!

name: 2weistein: The Curse of the Red Dragon 3 - Ronger Pirates
description: A new episode, following "2weistein in Asban" and "2weistein - The Lost Wood".

name: Save and Conquer
description: This is a 2D defense game that depicts the near future that may arise from climate change. Unlike the defense game, which is automatically attacked by traditional turrets, it is an attractive game that requires you to defeat the enemy by operating the turret directly with limited power.

name: Lofi: A Year to Fulfill my Dream.mp3
description: This is a story about a young woman who thinks and chases her dreams bravely under the pressure of reality and family. In order to prove that she has the ability to support herself with music as a career, Lu must show her strength by winning the annual award of the streaming platform.

name: Frogo 2
description: Frogo needs your help once more. To save Frogo you will have to avoid dangerous cars, collect enough strawberries and help find his home. Good Luck!

name: Morning Kiss
description: Morning Kiss is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Cross the Hell Master
description: "Cross the Hell Master" is a 2D cartoon style platform jumping game.

name: Pest Control
description: A fast paced garden defense game. Collect what you can before the pests take over!

name: Galaxy-X
description: Sin descripción

name: Nekomancy
description: Nekomancy is a Magic rougelite looter shooter! Craft spells and vanquish evil creatures! Grab their loot and craft better spells! Make progress in the skill tree! Only the best synergies pass the test!

name: Cronous Online
description: Cronous Online is a game that grows by competing or collaborating with numerous users. Grow by supplying various items and record your history against the demons that threaten the Cronous continent.

name: Screaming Noppy
description: Control your character with different sounds, dodge traps, solve little puzzles, and create fun levels that will make your friends nervous

name: Save Daddy Trump 3: Rise of Evil
description: after many years the peace has been disturbed in Peaceland. New army has captured Daddy Trump again. Now Kiki Trump is more powerful than ever and need meet new very powerful enemy and his army to save daddy Trump again in this low poly RPG game

name: Pako Highway
description: Drive through endless highways, dodge the obstacles and gather boost power by performing near-miss overtakes on traffic!

name: CyVeRpunk
description: CyVeRpunk is a fast-paced VR on-rail shooter where the player works for the mob in a futuristic cyberpunk-themed city. No motion sickness.

name: The Dragoness: Command of the Flame
description: The Dragoness mixes HOMM-like exploration, city-building and turn-based strategic combat, with a roguelite twist. Choose your battles, paths and skills as you explore a world ravaged by war. Gather and manage your army of beasts, collect resources and expand your city.

name: Curse of Black Bone
description: Adventure awaits in Port Royal, a town of treasures, mysteries and beautiful women! This epic, story-rich experience features hundreds of animated shots (mostly naughty ones), and a large world, filled with collectible treasures, booty calls, and an abundance of fun secrets and mysteries to uncover.

name: Third Power
description: Third Power is a unique puzzle adventure where players alternate between forms with distinct abilities in order to progress through a mysterious tomb. Avoid traps, crush monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of an enigmatic curse as you advance toward discovering your third power.

name: Amber City
description: A girl in a white dress wakes up in a ruined city. She uses her light to light up mysterious cocoons, reverse time, and restore the city to its former splendor. You take on the role of this mysterious girl. As you restore Amber City, more and more of its history will unfurl before you.

name: Lost Light
description: Join the "Firefly" task force and unveil the sinister plot behind the exclusion zone in the world of Lost Light. You could either scavenge for supplies or go out with guns blazing and plunder. Survive the brutal domain where danger lurks in every corner!

name: Hot Sento Girls and love
description: Hey, wanna warm up with me?

name: Wits of Gods
description: Wits of Gods is a multiplayer turn-based strategy card game. The game uses a shared deck and you do NOT need to build a deck. The rules are simple. Play your hand during your turn to operate your deity and up to 3 pets. We recommend that you start with a 2V2 mode (2 players vs 2 players).

name: Deadly Night
description: Carol is down on her luck, hitchhiking across the country. She arrives at a small roadside motel but there's something strange about the owner. As the secrets unravel, she finds herself entangled in a long, DEADLY NIGHT! Can she escape from hellish nightmare or will she die trying?

name: The Last of Us Part I
description:
Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters of Joel and Ellie in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards and now rebuilt for PlayStation 5.

Enjoy a total overhaul of the original experience, faithfully reproduced but incorporating modernized gameplay, improved controls and expanded accessibility options. Plus, feel immersed with improved effects and enhanced exploration and combat.

It also includes the Left Behind story DLC.

name: Eolia
description: Drop the controllers and save a desert world with Hands First VR in the follow-up to award-winning Ionia. Eolia, the symphonic fantasy-adventure follow-up in the award-winning Rhythm of the Universe series, reveals a brand-new world of storytelling.

name: Golazo! 2
description: Golazo! 2 boldly recalls the glory days of the arcade soccer games, bringing back memories of cult classics we all know. Street mechanics and fields are added to this sequel to bring more depth to this game. Certainly a perfect game for people who are wary of football managers or complicated hard-core simulators. You just grab your controller, sit on the couch and play!

name: BTank
description: BTank is a game in which you need to destroy balls with different properties using projectiles. By scoring points for destroying the balls, you can get extra lives.

name: Heroes of Time 2: Aizack's Return
description: This sequel is in the MV version. Totally revamped and faithful to the previous game made on VX Ace. Everything you experienced in the 1st and 2nd game is redone with MV graphics. In addition to the battle systems this time is sideview.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Collector's Edition
description:
Included in the Collector's Edition:
The Game: A physical copy of the game
Figurine: Serie Grandista Jolyne Cujoh - Special colour (26cm)
Prison Plate: A prison plate representing the convict number of Jolyne Cujoh incarcerated at the Green Dolphin Street Prison.
Deluxe Edition Bonus: The animation Special Event Color Set (5 types), an exclusive coloring set from the animation special event.
Season Pass: 4 characters will be included in this Season Pass, the owners will be granted with an early access on those characters.
Season Pass Bonus: An exclusive costumes for the 2 of the most iconic characters.
Collector Box: An exclusive collector box representing Jolyne and the other JOJO heroes.

name: Until the End
description: In Until The End, you play as Zoe, a young nurse who has just graduated. At the Montagne Institute, you will help her make the best decisions for the well-being of her patients in a palliative care unit.

name: Sonic World DX
description: Sonic World DX is a Heroes-style fangame with over 15 playable characters and 10 unique stages!

name: Legacy of Sin: Blood Oath
description: Buy unique troops, control the battlefield, defend the routes from different enemies! Hand drawn frame by frame 2D animation!

name: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R
description: A remaster of the fighting game "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle" with over 50 playable characters.

name: Restless Soul
description: Restless Soul is a hauntingly humorous adventure game about a soul trying to return to the land of the living. Take part in bullet-hell battles, unlock secrets, make friends with quirky spirits and more!

name: Z-Collapse
description: Inspired by the World War Z novel from Max Brooks, Z-Collapse takes you on a global zombie apocalypse. As the head of the government of your choice, make sure that your country survives! Dramatic decisions await you. How will you handle them?

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter
description: When the snow stops falling, the small Danish village of Tinglev will no longer be the same. Walk the path of Gerda as her quiet life is turned upside down during the World War 2 occupation of her home. Choose where to go, how to act, and who to trust in this intimate narrative RPG-lite experience inspired by real life events. How far would you go to protect your loved ones?

name: Tank Mechanic Simulator VR
description: Renovate & build II World War tanks. Experience highly detailed & realistic simulation game. Take tanks fully apart by using different tools. Transform them from rusty and ruined to fully working. Check them on the training ground, sell or put into your own museum.

name: Nordicandia
description:
Nordicandia is a semi-idle action RPG with a deep and unique crafting system.

Collect epic loot, craft and merge items, and level up your character to beat the World Bosses! Adventure forth as a mighty Warrior, agile Hunter or a powerful Mage. Assign Attributes to specialize your Character, and unlock unique Active and Passive Skills as you progress.

name: Chenso Club
description: It's raining aliens! When killed, they leave behind a life force that brings inanimate objects to life. Only the Chenso Club can stop them in this chainsaw-splitting, side-scrolling, brawler/roguelike/platform fighter.

name: MythBusters: The Game
description: Be a MythBuster in front and behind the camera! The game is a first-person sim that adapts the famous Discovery show. Run crazy experiments and manage the production of episodes.

name: Supaplex WOW!
description: FOR THOSE WHO ARE NOT AFRAID OF Supaplex HARD!

name: Ooblets
description: Ooblets is a farming, creature collection, and town life game where you build up your farm, befriend townsfolk, grow ooblets, and have dance-offs.

name: Galaxy Life
description:
The new owner of Galaxy Life, Phoenix Network, has decided not to revive Pocket Adventures. The main reasons for this were the fact that the game was too old (it could not be placed on Google Play anymore), and the fact that they were lacking the source code of the game. They plan a new mobile version, but it will be compatible with Flash, and thus will not be the same PA anymore. That's why this wiki will only get minimal updates, to keep the spirit of PA alive!

Explore the world of Galaxy Life, build a space colony, attack enemies, grab items and rule the universe. Galaxy Life is full of interesting planets and characters. You'd be surprised how big Galaxy Life is! In this free to play MMO strategy game that mixes traditional easy-to-play casual gameplay mechanics with touches of more traditional genres and features like tower defense, RTS, or several competitive PvP features in a persistent on-line Galaxy. You play together with others or your friends and take on evil, so gather your friends to fight evil in this Galaxy Life social game!

name: Dodge Spree X
description:
They held you captive - Time to escape from this dreaded place!
You better get moving before they come to catch you.

name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: Paint +
description: Sin descripción

name: A Prelude to an Adventure
description:
Hey! If you got about 5-10 minutes, then come and help an adventurer to prepare for a mysterious trip to the Land of the White Elephants. A Prelude to an Adventure is a little interactive experience with light puzzle elements, tons of animations and catchy music. Have fun!

Originally made for LOWREZJAM 2020 and then updated for MAGS August 2020 and then updated again to current version.

name: Lovely Cat: Dream Party
description: All contents are free! Various patterned cats, waiting for you to explore! Different furniture and different interaction methods are waiting for you to unlock! Call your beat friends to come to Lovely cat dream party, collect kittens, and create a wonderful paradise for kittens!

name: Pokémon Floral Tempus EX
description: Pokémon Floral Tempus EX is a fan game that is set in the beautiful yet corrupt region of Rialtra. When the time arrives, the protagonist and their two friends decide to embark on their brand new adventure, brimming with eagerness and hope. Unbeknownst to them, the evil Team Blight have been secretly planting their seeds of fate that will eventually entangle the three adventurers. Only time will reveal the real intentions of Team Blight and the shady institutions of Rialtra.

name: Timberlodge Inn
description:
On your way to Firemore you start feeling exhausted and dizzy. You decide you have to stop at the nearest motel to take some rest. Though what seemed as a quiet night at first quickly makes a turn to a hellish nightmare while you discover the unsettling and unnerving secrets of the town's past.

Welcome to Timberlodge Inn.

name: There Was a Mixup at the Factory!
description:
One of Funny Jester's duties as president of the Fiscal Jesters is quality control of the group's officially licensed fruit snacks, Juicy Jesters. However, there was a mixup at the factory and the Peachy Platinum gummies were replaced with actual platinum coins!

To preserve the financial solvency of the Fiscal Jesters, you simply must match as many rows or columns of snacks as possible, and fish out as many coins as you can before your forklift breaks down! But be careful, there have been other mixups at this factory before, and there will be more mixups at the factory.

name: PoN!: The Armadillo Island
description: In PoN!: The Armadillo Island, players are peaceful Armadillos who live on an island threatened by terrible robots that cut down trees, pollute rivers, mine, and burn, destroying nature. In the face of such devastation, the island's ecosystem becomes increasingly unstable and can collapse and disappear completely.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Whisper the Wolf
description:
A character addon for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

Whisper the Wolf, sneaking in from the Sonic IDW comics, with her Variable Wispon in tow makes it to SRB2!

Whisper is a very versatile character, with many tools for a variety of situations, perfecting each of her tool allows you to traverse maps with relative ease!

name: Reflexia Prototype ver.
description: Reflexia's story starts out as a parody of its genre and ends as a psychological drama.

name: Super Metroid: Subversion
description: Following the events of Super Metroid, Samus must destroy another Metroid research facility built by the Space Pirates on Planet TN578. This time however, the Pirates are more prepared to deal with Samus with the development of new weapons and armor based on Verdite technologies. It is time once again to protect the galaxy! With complete map and room overhaul, new items, new enemies, new challenge and difficulty modes and more!

name: 30 Days Another
description: 30 Days will change someone's life, maybe your life.

name: Shada Kalo
description:
A game jam build for the Epic Mega Jam 2022.
The theme of the jam was: "As Above So Below"

Control the pair of characters in game to solve your way out of each level by solving puzzles.

WASD : Movement

Space : Jump

name: Goetita: Turn-based City
description: Goetita: Turn-based city is a turn-based strategy game controlling the element of luck through rational judgment. Survive even in a desperate situation when all your resources are running out with your strategy in the cold and dark city!

name: Transformers Beyond Reality
description: Transformers Beyond Reality is an arcade-style first-person VR shooter. Join the fight as one of the first human recruits and immerse yourself in the world of the TRANSFORMERS. Battle alongside your favourite Autobots as you fight to defeat the Decepticons and save both Earth and Cybertron.

name: Arcade Archives: Pac & Pal
description:
"Pac & Pal" is an action game released in 1983. Turn over cards and eat fruit and special targets to earn score points.
Eat special targets to temporarily freeze enemies, and attack them.
The new character MIL will pick up fruit and cards, so touch her to get them back.

name: Maxon Petting Simulator
description: Maxon Petting Simulator is a clicker game about a cute kitty whose cheeks must always be squished. In this uncomplicated situation, Maxon's friends can help you: the cat who likes to jump by the TV, "Manulooshka", the Sandwich Cat, and many others.

name: Rainbow Mix Advanced
description: Learn how to mix colors in our game Rainbow Mix Advanced, with an advanced mode integrated.

name: Warlocks Quarry
description: Use your skills in looting, fighting, exploring and base building to survive and progress in Warlocks world.

name: Catlike Magic
description: Catlike Magic is a top-down auto-shooter where you attempt to dodge groups of gnomes, goblins and other types of short people. Learn magical skills, buy and upgrade items and then complain about getting destroyed by a swarm of lizards after only buying offensive items in this slightly unhinged game.

name: Heist Master
description: Get all the loot and become the ultimate heist master!

name: Glorp
description: Glorp is a short 2D platformer created by Knocturnal Studios in which you play as the titular character Glorp, an incompetently drawn ball of slime journeying through a strange prism armed with just a flashlight.

name: Canfield Solitaire Collection
description: 20 popular Canfield games in one. Play Canfield and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

name: SSS222: HyperSpace
description: A fast-paced addicting space shooter with an inspiration taken from many modern games. A project I have been passionately working solo for the past 2 years!

name: Live Maze
description: Live Maze is a Twitch fueled game where viewers type !play to be entered into a procedurally generated maze! Players will see their characters battle each other through the means of weapons and power-ups. A lovely intermezzo for Twitch streamers who wish to engage with their audience in new ways!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler
description: From the creators of theHunter: Call of the Wild comes a genre-defying fishing experience! Explore a vast and atmospheric open world in search of the perfect fishing spot. Ride the open waters alone or with friends and embark on your journey to become a master angler.

name: Siphonopolis
description: Enter a surreal, rotting, underwater world. Chat with some creatures. Murder a lot more. Find the heart

name: Chronescher
description: Chronescher is a challenging turn-based puzzle game in Escher-esque spaces. Use impossible geometries, teleportation and environmental snapshots to navigate your mind and uncover your lost memories.

name: Project Gunship
description: Rain hell on the enemy from 12,000 feet in an AC-130 Gunship. Project Gunship provides an authentic and historical simulation of combat in all gunship variants from Vietnam to present day.

name: Cryptr
description: A singleplayer hack and slash dungeon crawler game with stat upgrades and numerous levels and enemies to defeat.

name: Lootun
description: Create and manage a team of adventurers by sending them to clear dungeons while you handle the loot! Hunt for powerful items and then upgrade them to defeat challenging encounters!

name: DuolBots
description: Grab a friend and build your very own battle bot. Add weapons to you bot and take your creation into battle against another team in online combat. Communicate with your partner to control your bot. You both control every part but each part has had their controls split between the both of you.

name: Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory / Fallen Legion Revenants - Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory / Fallen Legion Revenants game, Deluxe Digital Soundtrack (download code), and “Fallen Legion Compendium” Mini Art Book

name: Neophyte
description: A mini action rogue-lite with chaotic spell-slinging hack-n-slash combat. Collect spells and perks to become an unstoppable wizard and destroy hordes of monsters.

name: Wormatozoa
description: A gross 2D point-and-click precision platformer about parasitic worms. Guide them through a human body in this tough-as-nails arcade slither-em-up!

name: Grow Flow
description: A first person parkour game with art inspired by european avant-gardes. Make your way through over sixty levels with plenty of different mechanics to explore!

name: Mechanibot
description: In this tactical rogue-like auto battler, you'll build your unique team of robots and keep them alive as they fight. Battle through waves of enemies as you travel from planet to planet on a mission to fix the sun. Strategize, protect, survive. A Mechanibot's wrench never rests.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
description: Evasive Maneuvers is a team-based online multiplayer spaceship arena. 2-8 players are split into 2 teams; runners & hunters. Runners attempt to pickup enough energy to power up the warp gate to allow their escape. Hunters attempt to prevent runners from escaping by using their ramming ships.

name: Bearded Dragons
description: A lightning-fast indie brawler where bearded drag queens fight over cash tips that rain down from the sky.

name: Beyond the Wire
description: A tense multiplayer FPS set in the brutal, bloody trenches of WW1. In battles up to 50v50, players will be immersed in cinematic environments that convey the desperate & brutal circumstances of the Great War. Features an authentic arsenal & a unique melee combat system.

name: Scathe
description: Scathe is an intense, blood-soaked FPS where quick reflexes are the key to surviving the bullet Hell labyrinth that stands between you and your ascension. Rip through the underworld's deadliest demons and collect the Hellstones with drop-in/drop-out online co-op gameplay.

name: Prototype Jam 3
description: 28 levels + custom start map, offering a variety of map sizes and gameplay themes. All maps were made in 1-2 weeks, using the Prototype textures by Khreathor. Built on Copper v1.19

name: Blood on the Clocktower
description:
Blood on the Clocktower is a game of murder and mystery, lies and logic, deduction and deception for five-to-twenty courageous players and one devious storyteller.

A social game played in person or online, seated in a circle, each player receives either a ‘good’ or ‘evil’ token with their unique character on it. Good players share information to solve the mystery whilst evil players lie about who they are and what they know. The good team wins if they can piece together their knowledge, trust each other, and execute the demon. The evil team wins if the demon can sow distrust, evade detection, and wipe out the village.

name: Super Metroid CRE 2
description:
Samus ends up once again in a world made purely out of the CRE tileset.
Prepare once again for janky art, and have fun!

The second installment of the CRE series.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Skin Pack
description: Tuxedo, Mankini or sparkly Unicorn - 10 special skins for Crypto, the king of evil aliens himself. Fly high, with 4 special skins for his trusty saucer. Dress for the ocassion, dress for the invasion!

name: Gears
description: Adam and his friends gather for a beer in a bar... After being kidnapped by an assassin... he will have to play a dangerous and deadly game to save his life and that of his friends.

name: NBA Now 23
description: Experience an exciting NBA experience by playing on real NBA courts with real NBA players.

name: Dusk Diver 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nextbots In Backrooms: Obunga
description:
Nextbot is what will haunt you. Run from the trends in the worst place in the Backrooms. The scariest and most challenging account awaits you ahead.

You'll have to survive the pursuit in the Backrooms. Beware, the enemy will not be alone, there are many of them. They are cunning and nimble, you will not have time to react in time and lose. Huge mazes, incomprehensible corridors and scary corners await you. Compete with friends for time.

name: Zombies Noir
description: Protect your real-life home against zombies in Zombies Noir, an intense mixed-reality action game! Choose from a variety of zany weapons and defeat waves of zombies in the confines of your house.

name: Text Express: Word Adventure
description: Play Text Express: Word Adventure - a new genre defining game that combines word search puzzles, interactive stories and epic adventures! Join Tilly, a brave and smart young woman, as she travels in her old train to majestic destinations, meets new friends and unlocks her true destiny. Discover how the words you find impact the story!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Villa
description: Welcome to the Puzzle Competition World! Justine needs your help! Win the Puzzle championship by solving HD jigsaw puzzles! match the puzzle pieces and renovate the Villa!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - The Treasure of the Midnight Isles
description: The islands scattered across the dark abyssal ocean hide treasures untold – and horrors unspeakable. Board the grim cursed ship and venture into the unknown to find your fortune... or demise.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself into Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with the Ultimate Edition. Included are the base game and the Pathogen expansion with its new campaign, new weapons and more! Plus, both the Endeavor Pass and Veteran Pack!

name: 5 More Minutes
description: Fight against insomnia to get a good night's rest.

name: Geoblast
description: A Playdate arcade puzzle tile-matching game, inspired by games such as Dynomite, Puzzle Bobble/Bust-a-Move and Magical Drop.

name: Back 4 Blood: Children of the Worm
description: Children of the Worm features a brand-new Campaign story – Act 5 that puts you into an epic showdown with a fierce new enemy threat. To help combat this unknown adversary, this expansion will introduce “Prophet” Dan, a gun-toting, self-proclaimed preacher of the end times, who joins our growing list of Cleaners in their effort to save humanity. Children of the Worm also includes exclusive character skins, exclusive weapon skins, along with new weapons, accessories, and cards.

name: The Midnight Dance
description:
Prince Everett has been sickly ever since he was young. Out of fear for his life, his parents, the King and Queen, forced him to stay in his room. On the night of the biggest seasonal event, he is laying in bed wishing to dance the night away like others in his class.

As if an answer to his prayers, a stranger appears on his balcony injured and asking to be let inside. But without knowing his intentions, what can Everett expect of him?

This Victorian-era Visual Novel revolves around our main protagonist: Prince Everett. On a night like any other, he expects to retire to bed and sleep through a once-in-a-lifetime event. But during the night, he wakes up to the sound of something rapping against his balcony glass. When he investigates the noise, he finds a tall man with an injured shoulder asking to be let in for refuge.

name: Desert Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Desert Journey thorough the desert in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Knockout City: Season 7 - Mutant Mutiny
description:
Deep, deep, DEEP under the streets of Knockout City, a new kind of brawler is bubbling to the surface. What started as a rumor of glowing eyes, squishy footsteps, and muffled snarls from sewer grates is growing into a revolution of massive proportions. The Mutants are here, and they want justice.

It’s a new Season of Knockout City – a new day for brawlers everywhere to discover new cosmetics, battle it out in a new dodgebrawl map, and meet some legendary mutants along the way.

name: Island Cities
description: Arrange the town islands and see them come to life. Just swap the blocks of a 3D jigsaw puzzle.

name: Fighters of Fate
description: Test your CCG and trading card games skills, you’ll be able to collect cards and test your power in the live PVP arena! Be more powerful, test different deck options, and enjoy the thrill of the anime fighting games while putting the best of the trading card games strategies.

name: May's Mysteries: The Secret of Dragonville Remastered
description: Follow May, an independent and charismatic girl, in her quest to find her missing brother. An exciting puzzle adventure with hidden object elements.

name: World Fighting Soccer 22
description: Compete with your friends in an exciting new style of Soccer! Dazzle your fans and confuse your foes all with the press of a button! From the ground or high in the sky, strike and win the day!

name: Doxxed
description: After a botched face lift, a movie star confines herself to her penthouse apartment where she learns that her fans’ obsession may have turned fatal. Is her apartment really the safest place to be? Follow the clues and try to stay sane when it seems like the entire world has turned against you.

name: Ys Online: The Ark of Napishtim
description: Ys Online: The Ark of Napishtim is licensed and adapted from the sixth generation of the legendary Japanese franchise, the Ys series. The game, supervised by Falcom, inherits the soul of popular JRPG adventures. While revitalizing the original plot, a premier VA lineup was added to dub the entire story, crafting a richer and more refined experience. In the game, adventurers will accompany Adol to the Great Vortex of Canaan to meet the mysterious Rehdan Sisters and together explore the Ruins of the Winged One Civilization.

name: Buy Hyacinths
description: A colourful narrative adventure game. You're one of the first sheep to attend university. Roam the campus, attend lectures by day and enjoy friend-time at night. Discover campus truths, and sniff out secrets. Live the life of a campus sheep, but beware: not everybody wants to see a sheep graduate!

name: Amaya's Lost Soul
description: Welcome to Amaya's Lost Soul. In this 2d Action Game you play as Amaya the daughter of an all and mighty great “Creator” the leader of the out raiders. You Amaya are tasked taking down a kingdom in this choice driven 2d action platformer.

name: Commandos 2 & 3: HD Remaster Double Pack
description: Two cult classics in one bundle! Awaiting your orders, Sir!

name: City Legends: Trapped In Mirror - Collector's Edition
description: On your way to writing the perfect supernatural novel, be prepared to face danger. Are you ready for such desperate measures?

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Project W
description:
Experience true evolution in Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Project W.

This Chapter features a new Killer – Albert Wesker, The Mastermind – and 2 new Survivors, Ada Wong and Rebecca Chambers. The Raccoon City Police Department Map has also been reworked.

name: Colorless World
description: Immerse yourself in this strange Colorless World. Unleash new mechanics and defeat obstacles, monsters, and bosses. As you unravel a hidden story told between the lines that will shape your ultimate destiny.

name: Chess, but...
description: Play against a low level engine, simulating a 100 rated player, while completing challenges. Multiple difficulty modes make the game suitable for chess beginners and experts.

name: Shufflepoker
description: Shufflepoker is a revisited poker game, turned into a duel where you have to play tactics and tricks so that your challenger’s life points reach 0 before yours. Take a seat, sustain yourself and impose your style in this tavern full of opponents who are looking for fame.

name: A Loney
description: Welcome to the fantasy world of A Loney. Get ready for an exciting adventure with the main character! The world is filled with various creatures threatening the world! Grab your sword and deal with them!

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Pathogen
description: Continue the Aliens: Fireteam Elite story with new environments, maps, cosmetics, and a campaign that puts the crew of the Endeavor into their most perilous mission yet.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Dressed to Skill Edition
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The "Dressed to Skill" edition includes the base game as well as the following extra items: Reprobed: Skin Pack, Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (post-launch release), Reprobed: Official Orchestral Score, Reprobed: Digital Art Book.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Second Coming Edition
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The Second Coming Edition includes the following content:

- Crypto Statue – 70cm/27.6 inch
- Arkwobbler Statue
- Embossed metal plate
- Artbook
- Orchestral score (CD)
- Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (digital)
- Reprobed: Skin Pack (digital)
- Destroy All Humans! – Clone Carnage (digital)

name: The Last Secret
description: Light-hearted visual novel adventure with an epic tale - with challenging and fun puzzles, humorous storyline and quirky characters. Solve the "last secret", save your friends and maybe find true love on the way, too...

name: One-Armed Cook
description: One-armed Cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection
- Cloth poster featuring Kevin Eastman's adaptation of TMNT: Turtles in Time
- Multi-layer acrylic diorama of Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael and Michelangelo
- Enamel pin set of five classic designs
- Set of 12 translucent comic style character trading cards based on TMNT
- Full color artbook with 180 pages

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 3 - Deluxe Edition
description:
Prinny is back at it again, dood! Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3: La Pucelle: Ragnarok / Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure brings you two foundational titles in one!

Discover the world of La Pucelle: Ragnarok as it makes its North American debut. This action-packed RPG is loaded with tons of extra content including new scenarios, new recruits, and a whole gang of DLC characters in addition to a new voice cast, new music, and quick travel!

Dive back into your NIS roots and experience a game that laid the foundation for the beloved Disgaea series with Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure. Sharper graphics and updated image optimization bring this classic title into the present!

Plus, each physical copy includes the soundtrack and art book at retail. Experience a part of NIS history with this delightful combo pack!

Features:
• Overflowing with New Content: La Pucelle is back with tons of new content including the Overlord Prier scenario. You can also recruit Laharl, Etna, Flonne, and Prinny to join your adventures.
• Where it All Began: The return of the original Rhapsody strategy RPG from the PS1 now has sharper graphics and image optimization options to mimic CRT.
• Exclusives Included: The physical NSW release includes both a soundtrack and an art book!
• Extra DLC characters such as Rozalin, Cornet, Hero Prinny, and Elly are included as well.

What's Included:
• Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3 Game
• Anthology Official CD Soundtrack
• Compendium Softcover Art Book
• Collector's Box

name: La Pucelle: Ragnarok
description: For the first time in the West you can experience La Pucelle: Ragnarok, now loaded with lots of extra content including new scenarios, new recruits, and DLC characters! It even has new voices, new music, and quick travel, dood!

name: Delusions of a Lost Soul
description: Return to Lansinet castle to free your partner’s trapped soul. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and unravel the many paranormal mysteries that await you.

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 3
description: Join up with your pal Prinny to experience NIS history with Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 3: La Pucelle: Ragnarok / Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection contains thirteen previously released video games from the Arcade, Nintendo Entertainment System, Super NES, Sega Genesis, and the Game Boy. This collection is a great place for gamers to experience these popular titles on Steam.

name: F1 Manager 2022
description: Make your mark on Formula 1 in the officially licensed F1 Manager 2022. Choose your team and be the boss with the full 2022 roster of staff and drivers. Featuring full F1 licensing and true-to-life presentation.

name: Curse Crackers: For Whom the Belle Toils
description: Curse Crackers is a fast-paced acrobatic platformer where you bounce, vault, and fight your way through a whimsical world with the help of your loyal companion. Eat snacks, collect items, and travel the world to stop Bonnie and her band of troublemakers!

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

name: Immortality
description: Marissa Marcel was a film star. She made three movies. But none of the movies was ever released. And Marissa Marcel disappeared. The new game from Sam Barlow, creator of Her Story.

name: Tinykin
description: Catch hundreds of tinykin and use their unique powers to help Milo discover the origins of humankind - and get back to his home planet!

name: A pet shop after dark
description: A PET SHOP AFTER DARK is a horror point-and-click visual novel where you've taken on an odd job at a little pet shop.

name: Motocross: Chasing the Dream
description: Motocross: Chasing the dream' is a game being developed by a group of veteran MX Simulator content creators and players. This project was started out of curiosity and desire to facilitate change within the niche motocross game genre because a lot of the characteristics that give motocross its identity are nowhere to be seen during gameplay.

name: Zor: Pilgrimage of the Slorfs
description: Using a deck of cards and turn based tactics, delve through a procedurally generated gauntlet of areas filled with dangerous beasts and hostile terrain. If you survive, scavenge what you can and make camp, where you can craft cards and upgrades to meet the growing dangers to come.

name: Orx
description: Orx is a new take on the well-known tower defense genre, blending mechanics of popular deck building and tabletop games to create a truly unique experience. Grow your castle, expand your domain, and take a stand against hordes of green-skinned attackers!

name: Rem Psycho
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Quest
description: Join the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in their quest to defeat evil and eat pizza. In Nickelodeon's free and fun online action game, you can play as Michelangelo, Raphael, Donatello and Leonardo and take down baddies in the mean streets of New York City. It's up to you to use the Turtles' special abilities to save the world from enemies like the Kraang, the Foot Clan and more. Take on multiple bosses at once to beat the game! Play Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Quest and other free online quizzes and games now at Nick.com.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, The Number 1 Jigsaw Game On PC.

name: Siege of Osaka
description: Siege of Osaka is a retro hybrid of Beat-em-up and Brick Breaker. Send enemy ninja rolling into walls and fortifications to bring down their castles. Localized/parodied for American audiences.

name: Monsta Tapwar
description:
Face off against your friends or foes in Monsta Infinite’s MMORPG turn-based card game and beat your friends and become the #1 in our Monsta Universe.
Introducing Tapwar! The genesis of Monsta Infinite’s many contributions to the future of technology — incorporating state-of-the-art Blockchain technology into modern-day gaming!
In this strategy point-based card game, your points define your success. Join in today and collect points to climb up our ranks in our leaderboard for prizes and rewards!

name: 2-taku de Dasshutsu Game
description:
A quiz game where you can advance the story with two choices!
If you make a mistake, you will end up with a bad end, so be careful!

name: Krispain Hero
description: What can go through a former warrior’s head upon seeing an incomprehensible portal in the middle of the road? It is to go through the portal, of course, to explore an alternative past, where the world is definitely not ruled by people.

name: Holiday Jigsaw: Thanksgiving Day 3
description: Gobble-gobble! 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family harvest holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 3!

name: Slitherlink PD
description: A logic puzzle game - Create a single line loop using number clues.

name: Pocket Pets!
description: A virtual pet game for the Playdate

name: Who's Who?
description: Enjoy an intense game of wits with friends all around the world! Experience a sense of thrill and achievement by becoming the last survivor. Play different modes including "Police and Thief" and "Where`s everybody?".

name: Finding Ice
description: In this one-of-a-kind story game, the player must explore vast worlds through a third-person Arctic Wolf, complete puzzles, collect items and re-connect with nature.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Visitors of Spirit Realm
description: 2 new heroes are ready to join your adventure, as well as 4 powerful new weapons. Unlock them and prepare to explore the possibilities of new combinations and the refreshing combat experience!

name: Finding America: The Heartland
description: Welcome to America's Heartland! From the monumental Mount Rushmore of South Dakota to the humble farmhouses of Kansas, we're confident this lovely slice of American pie will have something just for you. Now let's go see the many beautiful things the Heartland has to offer!

name: My Divorce Story
description: Gather evidence for a successful divorce! My Divorce Story, created by an experienced divorce lawyer and based on real-life counseling, now on the Steam!

name: Magicians and Monsters
description: Flying battles, controlling Excalibur attacks, taming monsters, land and air battles, experiencing a different magical journey...

name: The Monster Under Your Skin
description: Play as a nameless man who suspects his wife of something, and get lost into his perception of that day when he was about to propose to her. Your choices can influence the the plot. Genre: thriller with some elements of romance.

name: Battle of Tanks
description: Don't let the army of enemy tanks reach the southern border of the battlefield. You have several guns at your disposal and the ability to call an airstrike. Move around the battlefield in the top view and choose the right guns to attack. You need to hold out for the allotted time.

name: Commandos 3: HD Remaster
description: Fall in, soldier! Commandos 3 - HD Remaster sends you to the relentless and unforgiving battlefields of Europe. Remastered in high definition including reworked 3D models and textures, improved controls and refined UI

name: Bhop Craze
description: Break the record! Beat your friends! Be the fastest of all! Compete with other players for the title of the best player. Run and jump through beautiful levels and discover dozens of mechanics that will give you unbelievable fun in the game!

name: NecroMerger
description:
The Devourer is always hungry and it’s your job to feed it in this idle merge game mashup. Play as the NecroMerger and use dark magic to summon an array of creatures (skeletons, zombies, demons, banshees… the list goes on). Merge them from piddly little grunts into massive (and tasty) brutes, before feeding them to your ever hungry pet.
As you grow your Devourer you’ll attract the attention of merchants, champions and even rivals. Some can be useful, others must be fought… or fed to your insatiable pet. The bigger the Devourer grows the more your lair will expand and you’ll unlock powerful abilities and spells.

name: Project Winter Mobile
description:
Project Winter is the popular social deception game on PC, now it is coming to mobile!

It's a game about collaboration and betrayal, survival or death.
You will try to survive a deadly blizzard with 7 of your teammates,
Search for supplies, call for help, and escape from this white hell.

name: Royal Duality
description: Royal Duality is a free dark fantasy visual novel game with more than 15 endings. Work with a mysterious 'guardian of stories' to complete the tale - your choices dramatically impact on the outcome of the story, but will you reach the final ending... or will you find yourself trapped in an ending where all hope has been lost? With additional side stories and hidden easter eggs to find, the guardian will put you to the test in order to reveal the true story of Royal Duality.​

name: Is it you?
description: Give it a go for a thrilling hunch-game with players all over the world! It has various interesting draws that you can enjoy with your acquaintances.

name: Speed the Card Game
description: Speed the Card Game - The fastest card game ever!

name: Curses
description: Curses is a cute and darkly comedic game about trauma, fantasies, vengeance, magic and healing. With the aid(?) of your cat you explore a variety of emotional responses to trauma and face the ethical question: to curse or not to curse.

name: Slime Girl Smoothies
description: Prepare to see a lot of jugs while mixing up some very wacky drinks in this Slime Girl bar puzzle!

name: Psikyo: Shooting Library Vol. 2
description:
Psikyo Shooting Library Vol. 2, is squeezing six titles into one juicy bundle! Including;
- Sengoku Ace
- Sengoku Blade
- Sengoku Cannon
- Gunbird
- Gunbird 2
- Gunbarich

name: Save the Girl
description: Save the Girl, the last remaining survivor in the zombie apocalypse

name: Sudo K.O.
description: Fill sudokus to fight against monsters and gain better loot as a reward. How far can you go without perishing? Claim your spot on the online leaderboards!

name: World Domination wit Cam
description:
World domination is not easy. Join me as we figure it out together. I think it kind of goes like this, yeah that's the way, you're killing it!

A sort of boss battle, sort of actiony game, but don't worry, you can't die! Move the mouse around to trigger actions with the beat.

name: Meyni
description: Inspired by The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, this is a work of interactive fiction built in Twine. Play in your browser on any device.

name: Solitris
description: Solitaire, Meet Tetris

name: J3ss1c4
description: A platformer where you try to escape a laboratory while a robot makes fun of you. Developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

name: Hodgepodge Hunch
description: Hodgepodge Hunch is a who-done-it game where everyone chips in to make a hotpot dish. Collaborate with your buddies to collect ingredients in the dungeons and whip up a delicious feast. There's just one problem... A backstabber may be lurking among you who'll throw your dinner plans awry...

name: Tourabutchi
description: The Tourabutchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the video game series Touken Ranbu.

name: Pokémon Revelation
description: Pokémon Revelation is a vanilla quality-of-life enhancement decompilation hack of Pokémon Emerald. Pokémon Revelation aims to add as many QoL features as possible from the more recent games while looking and feeling just like vanilla Emerald and maintaining compatibility with the official games. Features include: catching all 386 Pokémon, reusable TMs, battle difficulty, decapitalization, and much more!

name: Six Braves: Summoner
description: Buy the character shown and start a new adventure! The new character will have new skills, exclusive equipment, and a new plot as well as new secrets to solve. The structure of the interior of the Tower will also change according to the new character

name: Missile Crank
description: Missile Command style game with upgrades between levels, only on Playdate!

name: Soccer: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nik and Kit Arcade: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Pacmaga
description: Sin descripción

name: Splash Ship
description: Splash Ship is an arcade game in which you control a boat that moves along a zigzag water canal, where there are sharp turns and dangers lurk at every turn.

name: The Jumping Pasta: Turbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Egg
description: A surrealist text-based RPG. You will explore an island, solve puzzles, and fight enemies, all in your attempt to get the Dark Egg.

name: Colorider
description: Colorider is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game.

name: Solitude Underwater
description: Solitude Underwater is a short horror adventure game. Two treasure-hunting brothers are searching for sunken riches off the coast of South Africa, only to find themselves immersed in catastrophe after one of them gets trapped in a cage, deep inside shark-infested waters.

name: Commonplace
description: A small-scale game about ordinary people in an ordinary place.

name: Slime Dice
description: Slime Dice is a Turn-Based Party RPG where you settle battles by playing Yatzi. Create all your own characters, both visually and stat wise, and set out to destroy the beasts of Spegroon!

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8
description:
In the episode titled From Burn To Return (Hell Fire), Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8, demons take over the town and kidnap everyone. A horror game.

In this chapter, Slenderman has gained the power of fire, making him more dangerous than ever before, and the only man who can stop him is the town's brave firefighter.

As the player, you must save the town from this fiery nightmare.

name: My European Trucking Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight's Drop
description: There's only one Knight on the board. Move and the tile you were standing on disappears which leaves the next player with less possible moves.

name: Terra Nova Pinball
description: Ricochet around an alien world in this Pico-8 pinball table.

name: Calmed by the Dark In:Finity
description:
Set XXXX years in the future, a woman wakes up in a cyber world with no humans in sight, she begins her quest to search for other survivors and understand what is happening in this new reality.

Explore dungeons, collect monsters, and uncover what happened to mankind in In:Finity.

name: Malevolence
description: Malevolence is a 9 map single player Boom Compatible episode tested in PrBoom+. It features extensive dehacked changes to enemies and weapons. It pits you against an evil SuperAI and its cyborg army as you try to shut down Malevolence before Earth gets converted into cyborg central.

name: Sure Shot featuring Sonic the Hedgehog: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Penguin Paradise
description: Penguin Paradise is a variant of the popular game Gorilla Tag. It can be accessed inside the App Lab for Oculus Quest. What makes it unique is a combination of its snow/ice themes and the fact it regularly adds non-tag game modes.

name: Kitten Adventure: Ultimate Meow!
description:
Kitten Adventure: Ultimate Meow! is a revamp of Kitten Adventure, previously published in 2021.
The revamp includes new gameplay mechanics, improved visuals, and brand new levels added!

name: Clean Robo
description: Manipulate the triangular robot cleaner to take out debris in exquisite crevices!

name: Demo Disc: Spectral Mall
description:
In the before-time - your childhood, or perhaps those of your forebears - the mall stood king among shopping locales. People of all kinds flocked to them, swarming store after store, purchasing copious amounts of tie-dyed fabric and greasy food and novelty knives. But now the people are ,dead, and the corporate catacombs stand silent. Their only customers now are rats and cockroaches.

Of late, though, there have been murmurs in the emptiness - flashes of too-bright colors, flickers of wires and flesh, strangled electric sounds, almost like screams. Brave or foolish souls have returned to the sites of their pasts, spurred by curiosity. The few who have returned, amidst their gibbering, mad cries, spoke of change. Storefronts peddling wares that they do not contain, advertisements that flicker in the corner of one's eye, and distant, echoing footsteps, coming from everywhere and nowhere in the dust-suffused halls.

Your town bore one such decrepit mall, a hopeful tourist destination long since abandoned by the few teens that frequented it. Yet you find yourself standing before it in the gloom, for the first time in years. Lights flicker from within, tinny music emanates from disconnected speakers. And a phrase burns in your mind as if carved with a burning knife...

name: GameBreak
description: GameBreak is a local multiplayer Mini Game Collection. That requires 2 Players to play.

name: The Volleyball B
description: Sin descripción

name: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs
description: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs is hardcore arena survival game, collect crystals, kill bugs and have real fun!

name: Round Invaders Rush 2
description: Observing strange movements. The creature seems to be capable doing much more than we've ever expected from such a thick, useless blob of gel... No! NO! He can actually RUSH! The experiment is going out of control. He will eat ALL of our ice cream! Our secret samples are in danger!

name: Lucky Stamina
description: A crossover between the lucky and the unlucky! Lucky stamina!

name: Takoyaki Party Survival
description: You should consume a good balance of protein, carbohydrates, and fats to survive. The nutritional balance changes depending on the ingredients you put in your takoyaki. If you are overloaded with calories, you will be too full to eat, so please consume calories by squatting.

name: UnHappy Place
description: UnHappy Place is a game that concentrates on depression. The main goal of the state is to better the main character's mental health by doing simple things, such as cleaning the apartment.

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Massage
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a Futanari masseur and her client, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Chronicles of Refugia
description: In the aftermath of catastrophic global warming, humans live in conflict with their new, not-so-human neighbors... and three "Alices" must fight against humanity to ensure the survival of their race.

name: Crossroads of Life
description: Crossroads of Life - a game in which you have to fight off waves of enemies while protecting your life.

name: Unstable Rock
description: The stone predicting the weather is out of order, now it not only predicts, but also changes the weather by controlling the direction of the wind, collects the remnants of its tiny fragments in order to gather into a large boulder and roll off into the horizon!

name: Percy Parcel
description: VR Warehouse Survival Action. Stock shelves to survive a week in the warehouse.

name: Beach Island Deluxe
description: Beach Island is a micro open-world platforming game set on the mysterious Beach Island. Scour the island for stars to open up the ancient gateway portal! There's plenty to explore and uncover on Beach Island, can you find all 12 stars?

name: Party Pie
description: Party Party is a VR party game, you can draw and share your own characters, chanllenge large number of unique levels with them. We will also add the map editor in the future , you can create your own levels!

name: My Neko Waifu!
description: A puzzle with anime girls on the beach. You can get to know each kitty better by passing exciting levels.

name: ShapeR
description: SHPR is an arcade shooter, arena survival roguelike in which you have to choose items, create builds and synergies that will help you to defeat enemies and bosses to be able to pass to the next levels.

name: Missile Tank
description: We will destroy the boxes that appear randomly around you with a rocket that we will fire in the direction of the arrow on our tank.

name: Task Force
description: Task Force is a tactical third-person shooter that focuses on close quarters infantry combat.

name: How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom
description: The once prosperous kingdom of Avon now lies in tatters with nothing left in its coffers and a pitiful four citizens to its name. Yet even at its darkest hour, Princess Ariadne is still determined to restore it back to its former glory. Will her perseverance carry her through?

name: Tournament: Blood & Steel
description: Tournament: Blood & Steel is a single player medieval action game with role playing elements. Set in the fictional land of Edron, the player must fight in gladiatorial tournaments to earn fame and riches!

name: Bacon Grease
description: Bacon Grease is a rather typical city map with particular attention payed to a grimy mood and a strong sense of place. You'll make your way through the streets of a besieged city, encountering a mix of commercial, residential, industrial, shopping, and transit locations.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Cesar's Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Nonno's Legend
description: A game about imagining places you’ve never seen. Nina's grandfather shows her that a globe has some magical properties—you can reshape the planet!

name: DragonScales 1-7 Bundle
description: All seven parts of the famous tile-matching and strategy game! Connect tiles of one color to vaporize rows. Use powerful spells and receive bonuses, fight evil bosses and enjoy all seven parts of the "DragonScales" serial with over 900 levels!

name: Atsumete! Banki-chan
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Kid Canary & The Midnight Tower
description: A chill game about battling monsters in a scary dreamlike dungeon.

name: Reflector
description: An action arcade high score chaser made for the Playdate. Reflect incoming projectiles into each other in order to destroy them.

name: Margo
description: Margo is a short (30-60 min), point-and-click style slice-of-life adventure/art game. It follows the character of Margo, who has just awoken from an accidental nap. The player must complete various tasks to guide Margo through her evening, while putting up with her habit of overthinking.

name: White Mirror
description: A hardcore platformer, intended for speedrunners to try to beat as fast as possible !

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Deluxe Edition
description: For the dedicated NHRA fan, this Deluxe Edition features the NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All base game plus the John Force Racing (JFR) Pack.

name: PJ Masks: Heroes of the Night - Complete Edition
description: Go into the night to save the day as Catboy, Owlette, and Gekko! Use your superpowers to explore the world of PJ Masks and find secret collectibles, in a platforming adventure for little heroes. Can you stop villains Romeo, Luna Girl, and Night Ninja taking over the world?

name: Grim Tales: Horizon of Wishes - Collector's Edition
description: What is Richard up to? Pursue Anna’s missing father through time!

name: My Friend Peppa Pig: Complete Edition
description: Start a fun-filled adventure with Peppa Pig. Create your style, meet favorite characters, and play in Peppa's world. It's just like being in the TV show!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Est/Etat 241A Mountain Locomotives
description: Drive these powerful 4-8-2 (241 in the French system) “Mountain” locomotives. Entering service in the early 1930s, these locomotives were built using the De Glehn compound system, like many French locomotives of their time.

name: Tanitani Wizard
description:
This is a retro style pixel-art bullet-hell shooting game.
Dodge the barrage of bullets, destroy enemies and obstacles to advance.
There are several types of items available from treasure chests, including shot enhancements, movement speed increases, and a randomly selected companion Tanishi(snail).
The ability of the companion Tanishi(snail) slows down the enemy's shot, and sometimes even eliminates the enemy's bullets.

name: Witch College Bundle
description: Can you reveal the secrets of the elusive Sunflower Witch?

name: Soul Hackers 2: Bonus Story Arc - The Lost Numbers
description:
Grants access to "The Lost Numbers" bonus story arc and new dungeon.

Centered around a new Devil Summoner, Nana, you'll experience this side-story over the course of multiple requests (recommended levels ranging 19-99), which will appear gradually at Club Cretaceous as you progress through the main story.

name: The Jumping Pasta
description: Sin descripción

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023
description: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: Double Damnation
description: Kill fast. Die faster. Abuse Immortality! Together...

name: Monument Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Monument Journey thorough the USA in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Cube Farmer
description: Cube Farmer is a puzzle game where your goal is making the plantation grow on the island. To do this you need to put the water cube in the correct position that is indicated in the archipelago and then go to the next island.

name: The Button Be
description: Sin descripción

name: Pussy 6
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Cube Adventure
description: This minimalist game will help you pass the evening.

name: Pip 2
description: PIP 2 — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes

name: Among Ass: Trilogy
description: Local party or single player game about teamwork and killing with forbidden items!

name: A.I.T.W
description: Play a light FPS with little story up to 4 hours & collect items, cool weapons or see The merchant, use your ability's & grapple hook to destroy your foes and reach high areas, stop a cybernetic army and other enemy factions, play 4 onslaught maps.

name: Thrice in a row: Last Adventure
description: The final part of a great game Available 28 completely new levels. Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses.

name: Blob Quest
description: Guide your Blob through several levels in this adventure full of dangers, treasures and monstrous enemies. You'll have to solve many puzzles and prove your skills to succeed.

name: Soul Hackers 2: Digital Premium Edition
description:
The Soul Hackers 2 - Digital Premium Edition includes:
- Soul Hackers 2
- Bonus Story Arc: The Lost Numbers
- Booster Item Pack
- Bonus Demon Pack
- Costume & BGM Pack
- Pre-Order Bonus - Persona 5 Phantom Thieves outfits
- Mary's Maid Frock outfit
- Ai-ho Demon

name: Soul Hackers 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Soul Hackers 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Soul Hackers 2
- Bonus Story Arc: The Lost Numbers
- Booster Item Pack
- Pre-Order Bonus - Persona 5 Phantom Thieves outfits

name: Endometric Void
description: A sci-fi shooting game, with dashing and 'freezing time' to freeze enemies in place. There is simple hip-firing for each weapon. Lastly, it's a free-to-play game. Whoever wants to play it can play it :)

name: Mahjong Minimal
description: 100 hand-made Mahjong puzzles with beautiful abstract visuals and an ambient relaxing soundtrack.

name: Neon Dungeon
description: This is a neon style and fast-paced platform jumping game. In the game, you need to avoid many obstacles and finally reach the star of victory.

name: Space Route
description: Space route is a game in which you have to control a space ship and dodge meteorites to get to your home planet, and you will only find out how long this journey will be in the game itself.

name: Lonely White
description: Sin descripción

name: Angry Cat
description: Angry Cat will immerse you in a fun and rewarding adventure. Show all your skill and coordination in this action-packed game. Can you lead the kittens to victory?

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Ultimate Edition
description: For the ultra die-hard NHRA fan, this Ultimate Edition delivers to you not only everything showcased in the Deluxe Edition, but also loads of additional content available for NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All.

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All
description: NHRA is back – bigger and better than ever! Immerse yourself into the teams, tracks, tuning, and strategies, then strap into the driver’s seat in your ultimate quest to become the Champion among the true Beasts of the Strip. Key Game Features: • 5 NHRA…

name: Making Lovers After Stories
description: Making Lovers After Stories contains the official extra stories for Making Lovers. Experience the crazy stories that are happening to your favorite girls!

name: Tracing Decay
description: Tracing Decay is a dark dystopian simulation, that revisits impactful art that revolves around themes of decay, memory loss and recollection. The experience allows the player to explore the environment freely in search for several galleries within the ruins.

name: Angel's Awakening
description: Angel's Awakening is an Interactive Erotic Story about the amazing sexual awakening of a shy, reserved young librarian in the 1940s. In classic NOIR style, follow Angel's journey as she transforms from a repressed young woman into an uninhibited, lustful goddess with an insatiable appetite for sex.

name: Joint War
description: Joint War is a team-based tactical F2P first-person shooter set in the old-school era. Infiltration, hostage rescues, bomb planting/defusing and more.

name: End of Summer
description: Sin descripción

name: I Was Wrong
description: A gorgeous short exploration game, focused in tell the story of brilliant man, who ended up trapped inside his own mind. He needs to escape from his mind, but the only way is follow a strange female voice while he tries to remember important things by reading messages in old monitors.

name: Asteroid
description: Asteroid is an open world action adventure RPG set in space! Explore the universe to save planets, upgrade your ship and equipment, and defeat increasingly fearsome enemies!

name: First Time in Rome
description: Travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole are headed to Rome for a big job with a local tourism agency!

name: Just Sign!
description: Just Sign! is a 1-4 players tower defense online/local co-op, where you build the turrets. Get resources, refine and craft them into defenses to counter various enemies and bosses on dynamic maps.

name: Soul Hackers 2: Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: NHRA: Speed for All
description: NHRA is back – bigger and better than ever! Immerse yourself into the teams, tracks, tuning, and strategies, then strap into the driver’s seat in your ultimate quest to become the Champion among the true Beasts of the Strip.

name: Mr. Triangle's Maze
description: Escape a sinister maze and take on the Maze Masters in this retro styled puzzle game!

name: Nexomon + Nexomon Extinction: Complete Collection
description: Return once again to classic monster catching and experience the complete Nexomonstory with two epicadventures in one!

name: Baldo: The Guardian Owls - The Three Fairies Edition
description: Action, adventure, dungeons... Dive into a thrilling odyssey!

name: Rule No. 2
description: Rule and the greatest warm-up game are back for seconds! Kickstart your eyes, limbs and otherwise general biology from the vestiges of normal (boring) human behavior and become honed and sharpened as you battle an onslaught of Waifus and Geometry for your position on the Leaderboard!

name: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
description: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

name: Hole in the Clouds
description: Leave the ground behind in this skill-testing game of airborne golf. Pop the clouds and beat the obstacles to sink your ball under par. Find out if you’ve got what it takes to beat all 54 holes of mind-bending challenges.

name: Evelyn's Adventure
description: Join Evelyn and the thief Moon Mask on a journey through a large open world full of dangers, secrets and treasures in this third person 3D fantasy adventure game to win the knight tournament, claim the hand of the princess and save your mother's life with her help.

name: Soul Hackers 2: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Soul Hackers 2
- Three-disc 25th Anniversary Music Album
- 100-page 25th Anniversary Book
- Aiho-kun Figure
- Special Costume & Demon Fusion DLC

name: Roniu's Tale
description:
Polish those magic and thinking skills, because there's no turning back! Help Roniu find his way through a death-defying dungeon and take down a plague of enemies hellbent on keeping him there. Watch your step, you're no longer on stable ground!

47 Levels of Dangerous Pathways
Head Scratching Puzzles
A Whirlwind of Enemies and Epic Bosses

name: Race me now
description:
Race fast, race others, race me now!
Race sneaky opponents in beautiful surroundings. Race are fast and ruthless, other drivers will try to push you out of the road to take your place. Will you be able to push them first? Will you be able to beat them all? Will you become the champion?

name: Flight 74
description: Experience a new genre of VR Flight Simulator (Rift & Oculus Quest). Do you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate pilot? Run missions for the South American Cartel and prove your worthiness.

name: Brok the Investigator
description: Brok is an innovative adventure mixed with beat 'em up and RPG elements. In a grim world where animals have replaced mankind, what kind of detective will you be?

name: Car Wash Simulator
